name: Flappy Santa Claus Bird - Impossible Xmas flying adventure!
name_original: Flappy Santa Claus Bird - Impossible Xmas flying adventure!
description:
*** " YES! Flappy is back for a Chritmas Time and is better than the original!!! " - AppZone ( 9 / 10 )
*** " I will be playing until the brutal bitter end and loving all of it." - EuroGamer (5/5)
----------------------------------

Tap to fly! Avoid the posts to collect your eggs. Are Yoy good enough to unlock special Santa Claus' cap and bonus level?
